title: Bar do Mineiro
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Traditional food from Minas Gerais with large variety of cacha√ßas. Offers a Brazilian dish with brown rice, black beans, soy meat, pumpking puree, and green collar (cost is approx. 58 reais/pp). Casual and busy. Aug 2015 reported no longer offering vegetarian feijoada.
streetAddress: rua Paschoal Carlos Magno, 99, Santa Teresa
